long_description: Get double the versatility from the Eureka Glide 115 LED Lantern/Flashlight. The sturdy aluminum housing pulls up to switch from flashlight to lantern mode. Telescopic housing lets you switch between an area lantern for your tent or table and a focused, penetrating square flashlight beam. Single white LED bulb puts out up to 51 lumens on 1 watt of power, brighter than many similar-sized flashlights. Runs on 3 AAA batteries, included. Lever-style on/off switch in base. Polymer C-hook in base for hanging. Eureka Glide 115 LED Lantern/Flashlight features aluminum housing with an anodized finish for durability. Carry strap and carabiner-style clip included. Overstock.
short_description: Get double the versatility from the Eureka Glide 115 LED Lantern/Flashlight. The sturdy aluminum housing pulls up to switch from flashlight to lantern mode.
